model

Class AbstractMovableGameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.AbstractGameObject
      • model.AbstractMovableGameObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICollider, IDrawable, IGameObject, IMovable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bird, Car

    public abstract class AbstractMovableGameObject
extends AbstractGameObject
implements IMovable, ICollider
    Abstraction for all game objects which can be moved.
    Author:
    Robert Wilk

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) static int BASE_ANGLE
      A heading value which equates to "straight" ahead.
      (package private) static double DEGREE_CONVERTER
      A degree/radian converter.
      private int heading
      The heading of the game object.
      private int speed
      The speed of the game object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected AbstractMovableGameObject(java.awt.Color color, Location2D location, java.awt.Shape boundingShape, int speed, int heading)
      In addition to the data taken by the super AbstractGameObject.AbstractGameObject(Color, Location2D, Shape) class, this constructor takes the speed and heading of the movable object.
